name: ousititi
description: A Node-RED application with [balena-supervisor](https://balena.io/docs/reference/supervisor/supervisor-api/) flow [support](https://github.com/balena-io-projects/node-red-contrib-balena), can be managed remotely via balena [publicURL](https://balena.io/docs/learn/manage/actions/#enable-public-device-url)
